channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Fashion Brands
channel.desc: Kick start your January with a fabulous wardrobe update! You're cordially invited to join us for an exclusive look at our all of our new fashion offers here at QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Get it or regret it.
channel.desc: Snap up the best offers at QVC before they're gone! We've got great savings on fashion, beauty, home and more, including items that won't be around for long.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Malissa J
channel.desc: Step into style with Fashion on Friday featuring Malissa J. Discover chic, versatile pieces perfect for any occasion, offering lasting trends and exceptional value for the modern woman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Top Finds with Samsung
channel.desc: Top Finds with Samsung.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: UK Lash
channel.desc: Achieve dramatic eyes you can't wait to show off with UK Lash. With all the sassy products you need in your make-up bag, this show is for beauties like you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Today's Top Tech with Samsung
channel.desc: Want to know what's hot in the ever-changing world of electronics? Tune in and explore the latest trends and innovations in TVs, computers, tablets, cameras and more from the leading brands.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Michael Perry's Garden
channel.desc: Join QVC's resident gardening expert Michael Perry with his stunning selection of plants and all the tools you could need, plus attractive decorations for a finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Free Delivery Cook's Essentials
channel.desc: Upgrade your kitchen with Cook's Essentials-QVC's exclusive cookware and electricals range. Enjoy free delivery on top-quality, great-value essentials designed just for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Jewellery
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Free Delivery Cook's Essentials
channel.desc: Upgrade your kitchen with Cook's Essentials-QVC's exclusive cookware and electricals range. Enjoy free delivery on top-quality, great-value essentials designed just for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Lara Pearls Collection
channel.desc: Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Tune in to see Dyson's ground-breaking Supersonic hairdryer and Airwrap styling tool. Discover how quick and quiet drying or styling your hair can be with these intelligent tools.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hello Summer Beauty
channel.desc: Take your beauty routine on a vibrant vacay with our Hello Summer Beauty event! We'll be showcasing bold and beautiful make-up, sunny skincare, the best in SPF and so much more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.
